description:
You want FREEDOM.

You have SKILLS.

You want to be your own BOSS.

Business Bootcamp is your place to start, grow or scale a business of your own.

Are you tired of your day job?

Do you hate having a boss breath down your neck?

Do you want to make more money and charge what you're truly worth?

Do you want more freedom to take time off, go on longer vacations, and enjoy life?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, you're in the right place.

I've been where you are right now. I know how hard it is to wake up each morning to go to a job you hate. I know how it is to be drowning in debt, working a job that doesn't pay me what I'm worth. I know how it is to start a freelance business without a following or website.

But...

After many years of research, experimenting, failures, and success, I am now running my own 6-figure per year business doing what I love each and every day. And I want to show you exactly how I do it.

This course walks you through the entire process of creating your own business from scratch. We start by defining your craft and choosing a skill of yours that will be the best for your business. We'll follow it up with market research to find your target audience and competition. We'll then build a website (learning from scratch) and capture leads with a foolproof sales funnel system. We'll learn how to find your first clients (and your next ones). Then we'll take it to the next level and learn how to properly run a business and grow it to 6-figures per year.

Guides, samples, and templates included! This course includes downloadable resources that will help you with contracts, proposals invoicing and more.

After 7 weeks, will you be making $100,000 per year? Probably not.

After 7 weeks, will you know how to make $100,000 per year? Yes.

After 7 weeks, will you be on the path to making $100,000 per year? Yes, if you put in the work.

ARE YOU READY TO TAKE ACTION?

Enroll now, and we'll dive right in.

Phil
title: Business Bootcamp: 7 Weeks to Start Your Own Business
